webaudio-knob.name: webaudio-knob
webaudio-knob.description:
Visual knob element
Example:
    <webaudio-knob min="-127" max="127"></webaudio-knob>
WebAudio-Controls is based on
   webaudio-knob by Eiji Kitamura http://google.com/+agektmr
   webaudio-slider by RYoya Kawai https://plus.google.com/108242669191458983485/posts
   webaudio-switch by Keisuke Ai http://d.hatena.ne.jp/aike/
 Integrated and enhanced by g200kg http://www.g200kg.com/
WebAudio-Controls is based on
   webaudio-knob by Eiji Kitamura http://google.com/+agektmr
   webaudio-slider by RYoya Kawai https://plus.google.com/108242669191458983485/posts
   webaudio-switch by Keisuke Ai http://d.hatena.ne.jp/aike/
 Integrated and enhanced by g200kg http://www.g200kg.com/

classitems.description: Fired when the knob value changes.
classitems.name: change

classitems.description: Default value. 'Holding' down a knob will restore this value.
classitems.name: defvalue

classitems.description:
Scaling value applied when displaying the value tooltip.

A (0-49) knob with scalar of 0.1 will only display
integer values 0, 1, 2, 3, 4.
classitems.name: scalar

classitems.description:
Knob sprite diameter, in pixels.

Setting diameter will set width and height to the diameter value.
classitems.name: diameter

classitems.description: Number of sprites in the knob image.
classitems.name: sprites

classitems.description: Display knob value as a tool-tip if true.
classitems.name: valuetip

classitems.description: Text to display as a tool-tip.
classitems.name: tooltip

classitems.description: Source URL for knob sprite images.
classitems.name: src
